Package utility

Class AlertPopups

java.lang.Object
utility.AlertPopups
public class AlertPopups extends Object
Class which handles all pop-up alerts the user may experience.

    • generateErrorMessage

      public static void generateErrorMessage(String messageToDisplay)
      Displays error message with passed String message.
      Parameters:

    • generateLoginErrorMessage

      public static void generateLoginErrorMessage(String messageToDisplay)
      Displays error message with passed String message that will be translated based on user locale.
      Parameters:
      messageToDisplay - String message to be displayed in error message.

    • generateInfoMessage

      public static void generateInfoMessage(String title, String messageToDisplay)
      Displays informational alert with passed String title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - Text to be used for title of alert.
      messageToDisplay - Text to be displayed in error message body.

    • generateCancelConfirmationMessage

      public static void generateCancelConfirmationMessage(int appointmentId, String type)
      Alert which confirms that appointment was cancelled, along with appointment's information.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment ID displayed in alert.
      type - Appointment type displayed in alert.

    • generateDeleteConfirmationMessage

      public static void generateDeleteConfirmationMessage(int customerId, String name)
      Alert which confirms that customer records were deleted, along with customer's information.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID displayed in alert.
      name - Customer name displayed in alert.

    • generateUpcomingApptMessage

      public static void generateUpcomingApptMessage(Appointment assocAppt)
      Informational alert to user as to any upcoming appointments (within 15 mintues) upon successful login, along with said appointment's ID, date, and time. Translated depending on user's locale.
      Parameters:
      assocAppt - Associated Appointment object (null if none exist)

    • receiveConfirmation

      public static boolean receiveConfirmation(String alertTitle, String alertText)
      Alert that requires confirmation from user.
      Parameters:
      alertTitle - Text to be used for alert title.
      alertText - Text to be displayed in error message body
      Returns:
      Returns true if user confirms, false otherwise.
